reviews.review: Half Life is a great game. The environments are nice, the gameplay is fun and challenging, the level design is nice, all that. The puzzles are workable but still kinda difficuilt, and the multiplayer is good. The only bad thing is the sound, which isn't top-notch.
Half Life is a very good game, from its sci fi/ spooky atmospere, to its fast controls, I feel like im actually in the game, which,  im not, which is a good thing. 10/10

I think half life is one of the best games I played, even if itâ€™s sound like a clichÃ©, this review will show you.
The story is about a doctor called Gordon freeman, that went one day to black mesa, the place where he works, to help finishing the new project of that company, tha will make everybody remember them, as the best science company, over aperture science. But the project somehow broke, and open a gate, to aliens, some of them are the head crabs, and itâ€™s up to you, to survive.
Without any spoilers, the story of this game is great, the weapons feels very fun to use, and the bosses are strong, but once you learn how to kill them, you wouldnâ€™t see them again for a long time.
The game is very fun, and know where itâ€™s the time to let the player some quite, where to surprise you, and when you think itâ€™s over, itâ€™s not. The game, even if it is FPS, still uses s lot of game puzzles, that letâ€™s you use your brain, game puzzles that donâ€™t effect the gameplay or making the game less boring, and can make it more of an action game, like you need to solve the puzzle, while fighting against enemies.
While the game Is very fun by the term of single player, unlike the other games you used to in this years, the multiplayer felt for me less fun, and the game lacks for today standards in term of graphics.
First, the multiplayer of the game, feels less balanced with strange but strong weapons, like a mosquitoes weapon that locked on the enemy, a lot of RPGs (because of quick) and many more.
The graphics of this game arenâ€™t what you want to play at 2018, because the game made in 1998, and the graphics then arenâ€™t a masterpiece.
But over-all, if you still didnâ€™t play this game, I think you should play if you like FPS games, because you will see you wouldnâ€™t disappointed.
Gameâ€™s pros and cons:
Pros:
-	Fun gameplay
-	Fully game story 
-	Great story
-	Fun puzzles
-	Knows how to surprise the player when he donâ€™t expect it.
-	Remembered main character.
Cons:
-	Bad graphics (at least for 2018).
-	Bad multiplayer. 
-	Nothing else more then the multiplayer and singleplayer.

Game settings:
-	FPS.
-	Puzzle game.
-	Require potato to bad computer conditions to run.
-	Parts single player (auto save sometime).
-	Require some skills to play.
-	Violent game.
-	Science fiction game.

I give this game 9/10

I suck at FPS and I just got this because it was less than 100 yen (around 1USD/1EUR) and I never got to play it when it was released, and I felt that I should play it at least once in my life just for the sake of history. 
For that price, I think everyone should play it. Even if you suck at FPS, it's still a milestone in this genre and you should at least know what it looks like. I don't plan to ever finish it but I still enjoyed playing it for a few hours (I probably died 50 times but okay). 
As someone else mentioned, I liked how the story was explained through dialogue and not logs or narration - you're as clueless as the main character, and that makes the story more immersive. The story is also quite interesting and the way you proceed feels quite natural and matches the story. 
Cannot say much about gameplay because as mentioned, I suck at it and FPS in general. It' s very old game but maybe it's because I'm old and the "newest" machine I could ever afford was a PS2, I didn't feel it was very dated, it still looked decent enough to me. 

Not sure if it's worth the full price given its age, but it's worth for everyone on sale!

its gud gem 10/10

I recommend this game but with an important note. In general, first person shooters from this era can be difficult to go back to if you've played any recent games in the genre. The game for the most part is still fun to play, but there are times when the controls and platforming feel fairly stiff. There are some really cool moments peppered in, but towards the end, it gets frustrating. I got my copy in a bundle with other Valve games. I recommend trying it since it is an important game in first person shooter history and still is for the most part fun to play, but keep the comments above in mind.

I have not played Black Mesa for comparison purposes, but if you are looking for the same story in an updated presentation, that may be worth investigating further.

El juego es legendario en el gÃ©nero de los shooters, hizo historia en su tiempo y revoluciono los juegos de disparos como se conocÃ­an en aquel entonces, el problema es que si no lo jugaste en 1998 y lo juegas 20 aÃ±os despuÃ©s te das cuenta que no sorprende en ningÃºn aspecto, es un juego que a envejecido y para jugadores mÃ¡s modernos se enterarÃ¡n que a dÃ­a de hoy no es nada del otro mundo, en su tiempo pudo ser de lo mejor de su aÃ±o pero hoy en dÃ­a los videojuegos han evolucionado y juegos como este half-life hay por donde sea e incluso de mejor calidad.

El juego es entretenido y tiene una duraciÃ³n muy buena cerca de las 20hrs y si te gusta puedes rejugarlo y todo por sorprendentes 70centavos de dolar en las ofertas por lo que pienso que aÃºn asÃ­ es un juego que vale la pena comprar por tan minima cantidad de dinero, no se pierde nada con probarlo.

The first Half-Life game i played was the second one for the original Xbox and i loved it. It was my most played game on my Xbox so instinctively when i got a steam account the first Half-Life game was one of the fisrt things i went for, obviously i haven't played it much on steam as you can see but that's not because it's not entertaining to play i've just sadly lost my taste for single player games. However, i do recommend getting this game for the short time i've played it on steam it has proven to be extremely addicting 10/10.
